statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (11,-2) and (13,-5).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{5}-{\left(-{2}\right)}}}{{{13}-{\left({11}\right)}}}=-\frac{{3}}{{2}} which reduces to \displaystyle-\frac{{3}}{{2}} (if it's not already reduced)
